name: Project Astro
description:
Project Astro

Imagine living on your own with no one around on a brand new planet or is it. No matter the distance you travel and the caves you find for shelter,  you must find a way to leave this planet or call it your new home. The main character Astro walks around a newly discovered planet with the intention to find a way out from a planet that nearly killed. Astro must travel to learn his surroundings and collect useful supplies to survive another day. Solve puzzles, learn your surroundings, and explore.

Project Astro provides a lot of backstory on why I came up with an idea to make an adventure game. Project Astro contains a personal story that is yet to be discovered from the player but from my side and it shows how I express my feelings in a game. I wanted to show how I view my life 85% of the time which is alone and in peace, just like Project Astro the main character starts out alone on a planet exploring, and maybe, in the end, he/she enjoys the peace and quiet.
